class.name: QueryResult
class.brief_description: Read the result from a query that were run on a [Database].
class.description: Read the result from a query that were run on a [Database].

method.name: get_cell
method.description: Gets a [String] value from the index-th cell.

method.name: get_cell_bool
method.description: Gets a bool value from the index-th cell.

method.name: get_cell_double
method.description: Gets a double value from the index-th cell.

method.name: get_cell_float
method.description: Gets a float value from the index-th cell.

method.name: get_cell_int
method.description: Gets a int value from the index-th cell.

method.name: get_error_message
method.description: Returns the current error message (if any).

method.name: get_last_insert_rowid
method.description: Returns the last inserted row's id. On some database backends this needs to be requested in the query to be available.

method.name: next_row
method.description: Read the next row. Returns true if success, false if no more rows available.
